content.rendered:
>SpeedFace-V5L [P] هو نسخة مطورة بالكامل من SpeedFace-V5L Visible Light Facial Recognition Terminal ،
Using intelligent geometric face recognition algorithms and the latest computer vision technologies. She supports
Face and palm verification with large capacity and fast recognition, as well as improved security and performance in all aspects.
SpeedFace-V5L [P] adopts touchless recognition technology and convincing individual identification that eliminates
Effectively hygiene concerns. It is also equipped with a definitive anti-impersonation algorithm for facial recognition
Almost all kinds of fake photos and videos are attacking. Most importantly, recognize the Palm 3 in 1 (Palm shape, palm print
And Palm Vein) in 0.35 seconds per hand ; the palm data obtained will be compared to a maximum of 3000 palms
.
The terminal unit with a mask detector helps to minimize the spread of germs and helps to prevent infection directly in each of them
An access point for any building or public areas such as hospitals, factories, schools, commercial buildings and stations
During the recent global public health case with the function of masked individual recognition during face and palm verification
.

deteils

Display 5-inch Touch Screen
Face Capacity 20,000
Palm Capacity 3,000
Fingerprint Capacity 20,000 (Standard)
Card Capacity 20,000
Transactions 200,000
Operation System Linux
Standard Functions ID Card, ADMS, T9 Input, DST, Camera, 9-digit User ID,
Access Levels, Groups, Holidays, Anti- passback,
Record Query, Tamper Switch Alarm, Multiple Verify
Modes.
Hardware 900MHz Dual Core CPU, Memory 512MB RAM /8G Flash,2MP WDR Low Light Camera,
Adjustable Light Brightness LED
Communication TCP/IP, WiFi (Optional), Wiegand input /output, RS485
Access Control Interface 3rd Party Electric Lock,Door Sensor, Exit Button, Alarm output, Auxiliary Input
Optional Function 13.56MHz IC Card
Facial Recognition Speed ≤1s
Biometrics Algorithms ZKFace V5.8 & ZKFinger V10.0 & ZKPalm V12.0
Power Supply 12V 3A
Operating Humidity 10% – 90%
Operating Temperature -10°C ~ 45°C (14°F ~ 113°F)
Dimensions (W*H*D) 91.93 * 202.93 * 21.5 (mm)
Supported Softwares ZKBioAccess

Downloads

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
•Visible light facial recognition
• Better hygiene with touchless biometric authentication and convincing individual identification
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against fingerprint attack (laser, colorandB / Wphotos), video attack and three-dimensional mask attack
• Available card modules: 12.5 kHz EM card / 13.56 MHz IC card
• Supplement the light with adjustable brightness
• Multiple verification methods: face / palm / fingerprint / card / password
• Mask detection ; Face Verification is available with masks
